recent_posts.title: Private Collaborative Custody with FROST
recent_posts.summary:
- The email explains a draft scheme for blinding and FROST compatibility.
- The scheme involves obtaining a public nonce and constructing an aggregate FROST nonce.
- Security should be carefully assessed due to the exclusion of the binding factor.

recent_posts.title: Nucleus: Capital-efficient multipeer Lightning payment channels
recent_posts.summary:
- The sender clarifies that the Bitcoin blockchain is permissionless, while the Lightning channel is not.
- Lightning channel requires the agreement of all participants, providing protection against Sybil attacks.
- Participants in Lightning channels must authorize each other, unlike the permissionless nature of Bitcoin.

- He implemented Staking Credentials using elliptic curve-based cryptosystems for the Lightning Network.
- Antoine looks forward to a game-theory formalization of the system dynamics.

active_posts.title: Blinded 2-party Musig2
active_posts.summary:
- We are implementing a 2-of-2 Schnorr Musig2 for statechains with full server-blinding.
- The protocol involves key and nonce aggregation, and the server never learns the final signature.
- More details can be found at [link]. Tom seeks feedback on the approach.

active_posts.title: Ark: An Alternative Privacy-preserving Second Layer Solution
active_posts.summary:
- Ark is a new second-layer protocol design that is an alternative to the Lightning network.
- It uses virtual UTXOs and does not require opening and closing channels like Lightning.
- Ark service providers enable anonymous, off-chain payments through rapid coinjoin sessions and liquidity fees.

active_posts.title: Concern about "Inscriptions"
active_posts.summary:
- In a worst-case scenario, blockchain growth would amount to 210.24GB per year.
- A 5TB hard drive costing less than $150 can provide storage for 21 years.
- Ongoing optimization efforts reduce the space required by individual nodes, ensuring sufficient storage.

active_posts.title: Resumable channels using OP_CHECKSIGFROMSTACK
active_posts.summary:
- The proposal introduces a new channel funding transaction with OP_CAT and OP_CHECKSIGFROMSTACK.
- Bob sends Alice her latest state during channel reestablishment through an extra field.
- The proposal includes fraud proofs, bandwidth-saving techniques, and concluding remarks about device usage.

active_posts.title: LN Summit 2024 Organization
active_posts.summary:

- The announcement is made in advance to address complexities like visa travels and weather.
- Antoine invites objections or feedback and suggests surveying stable countries for hosting the summit.

active_posts.title: Jamming Mitigation Dry Run
